name: PinInput.Root
description: For pin or verification codes with auto-focus transfer and masking options.
description_zh: For pin or verification codes with auto-focus transfer and masking options.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

autoFocus.description: Whether to auto-focus the first input.
autoFocus.description_zh: 是否自动聚焦第一个输入。

blurOnComplete.description: Whether to blur the input when the value is complete
blurOnComplete.description_zh: 值完成时是否对输入进行模糊处理

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the pin input when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the pin input.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次渲染时引脚输入的初始值。
当您不需要控制 pin input 的状态时使用。

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.
form.description_zh: 基础 input 元素的 associate 形式。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  hiddenInput: string
  label: string
  control: string
  input(id: string): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the pin input. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: pin 输入中元素的 id。对合成很有用。

invalid.description: Whether the pin input is in the invalid state
invalid.description_zh: pin input 是否处于无效状态

mask.description: If `true`, the input's value will be masked just like `type=password`
mask.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则输入的值将被屏蔽，就像 'type=password' 一样

name.description: The name of the input element. Useful for form submission.
name.description_zh: input 元素的名称。用于表单提交。

otp.description:
If `true`, the pin input component signals to its fields that they should
use `autocomplete="one-time-code"`.
otp.description_zh:
如果为 'true'，则引脚输入组件向其字段发出信号，表明它们应该
使用 'autocomplete=“one-time-code”'。

pattern.description: The regular expression that the user-entered input value is checked against.
pattern.description_zh: 检查用户输入的输入值所依据的正则表达式。

placeholder.description: The placeholder text for the input

readOnly.description: Whether the pin input is in the valid state
readOnly.description_zh: pin input 是否处于有效状态

required.description: Whether the pin input is required
required.description_zh: 是否需要 pin 输入

selectOnFocus.description: Whether to select input value when input is focused
selectOnFocus.description_zh: 是否在聚焦输入时选择输入值

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states
translations.description_zh: 指定标识辅助功能元素及其状态的本地化字符串

type.description: The type of value the pin-input should allow

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description_zh: 在输入更改时调用的函数

events.name: valueComplete
events.description: Function called when all inputs have valid values
events.description_zh: 当所有输入都具有有效值时调用的函数

events.name: valueInvalid
events.description: Function called when an invalid value is entered
events.description_zh: 输入无效值时调用的函数
